channel.title: NPR Programs: All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Zuckerberg grilled about Meta's strategy to target 'teens' and 'tweens'
item.description: The billionaire tech mogul's testimony was part of a landmark social media addiction trial in Los Angeles. The jury's verdict in the case could shape how some 1,600 other pending cases from families and school districts are resolved.
item.content:encoded:
The billionaire tech mogul's testimony was part of a landmark social media addiction trial in Los Angeles. The jury's verdict in the case could shape how some 1,600 other pending cases from families and school districts are resolved.

(Image credit: Frederic J. Brown)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn

item.title: 8 confirmed dead in Sierra Nevada avalanche
item.description: Eight skiers in the Castle Peak avalanche near Lake Tahoe are confirmed to be deceased.
item.content:encoded: Eight skiers in the Castle Peak avalanche near Lake Tahoe are confirmed to be deceased.
item.dc:creator: GREG MICEK

item.title: Carla Hayden recommends books by Black authors from 2016 that resonate today
item.description: We're continuing to celebrate Black History Month by looking back at 2016, a year that brought big moments in the culture.
item.content:encoded: We're continuing to celebrate Black History Month by looking back at 2016, a year that brought big moments in the culture.
item.dc:creator: Justine Kenin

item.title: Curling builds community in rural Massachusetts
item.description: In tiny Petersham, Mass., a volunteer-run curling club is a gathering place for people of all ages who love to curl and hang out.
item.content:encoded: In tiny Petersham, Mass., a volunteer-run curling club is a gathering place for people of all ages who love to curl and hang out.
item.dc:creator: Jill Kaufman

item.title: Foreign policy experts struggle to name Trump's vision of global affairs
item.description: President Trump's unpredictable rhetoric and actions when it comes to foreign policy amount to what some experts call a "madman strategy." Other analysts say Trump is actually a realist in this area.
item.content:encoded: President Trump's unpredictable rhetoric and actions when it comes to foreign policy amount to what some experts call a "madman strategy." Other analysts say Trump is actually a realist in this area.
item.dc:creator: Jackie Northam

item.title: Mass grave sheds light on 7th century plague
item.description: In modern-day Jordan, a 1500-year old mass grave sheds light on the lives of people affected by the Plague of Justinian.
item.content:encoded: In modern-day Jordan, a 1500-year old mass grave sheds light on the lives of people affected by the Plague of Justinian.
item.dc:creator: Durrie Bouscaren

item.title: In China, a meme is worth a thousand words
item.description: As China celebrates the lunar new year, the year of the horse has taken on an uncanny association with Draco Malfoy of the Harry Potter series.
item.content:encoded: As China celebrates the lunar new year, the year of the horse has taken on an uncanny association with Draco Malfoy of the Harry Potter series.
item.dc:creator: Ashish Valentine

item.title: Wrapping snow in blankets. Can it save the ski season?
item.description: Warming temperatures and snow droughts in the West threatens a billion-dollar industry. One ski area is experimenting with insulated blankets to keep snow from melting.
item.content:encoded:
the lowest snow coverage in decades.'/>

Warming temperatures and snow droughts in the West threatens a billion-dollar industry. One ski area is experimenting with insulated blankets to keep snow from melting.

(Image credit: Logan Brown)
item.dc:creator: Jaime Geary

item.title: Palestinian man says he was sexually abused in Israeli prison
item.description: A Palestinian prisoner who alleges he was sexually abused in an Israeli prison says he is telling his story to highlight the rise in abuse by prison authorities since the war in Gaza began in 2023.
item.content:encoded: A Palestinian prisoner who alleges he was sexually abused in an Israeli prison says he is telling his story to highlight the rise in abuse by prison authorities since the war in Gaza began in 2023.
item.dc:creator: Hadeel Al-Shalchi

item.title: An expected end-of-year federal ban puts hemp businesses in jeopardy
item.description: A federal ban on most hemp-derived THC products is expected to go into effect towards the end of 2026. That could put the kibosh on the most profitable market for hemp farmers.
item.content:encoded: A federal ban on most hemp-derived THC products is expected to go into effect towards the end of 2026. That could put the kibosh on the most profitable market for hemp farmers.
item.dc:creator: Molly Ashford
